front.title: Towards XML Based Management and Configuration

abstract.t: This informational document surveys a variety of existingtechnologies relevant to the exploration of an XML-based technologyfor network management and configuration. The technologies surveyedinclude SOAP, WSDL, SyncML, WBEM, RDF, CC/PP, and JUNOScript. Thedata representation capability of XML with and without schemas andDTDs is compared with SMIv2.
